title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin talks about Jim Harbaugh returning to Michigan after failing to land a head coaching job in the NFL this offseason. He reads Bill Belichick's press release about Tom Brady's retirement and why we need to realize this indisputable truth about their dynasty in New England. He shares the one person under the most pressure ahead of next week's Super Bowl. Plus, Greg Cosell from NFL Films joins the show to breakdown the top QB prospects ahead of the draft and how the Bengals and Rams were able to reach the Super Bowl. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
